section.title: Cell Commands
section.para: Create, remove, modify, pack, and replicate the model's unit cell.

section.title: adjustcell
section.para: Adjust a single unit cell parameter (one of 'a', 'b', 'c', 'alpha', 'beta', 'gamma', or one of the matrix elements 'ax', 'ay', 'az', ..., 'cz') by the given 'value'. This does not set the specified 'parameter' to the given 'value'; instead the supplied 'value' is added to the existing value of the parameter.
For example:
increases the cell angle 'alpha' by 5 degrees.
decreases the cell length 'c' by 10 Angstroms.

section.title: cell

listitem.para: cell ( double a, double b, double c, double alpha, double beta, double gamma )

section.para: Set cell lengths and angles of current model. This command will modify an existing cell or add a new cell to a model currently without a unit cell specification.
For example:
sets the model's cell to be orthorhombic with side lengths 20x10x10 Angstrom.

section.title: cellaxes

listitem.para: cellaxes ( double ax, double ay, double az, double bx, double by, double bz, double cx, double cy, double cz )

section.para: Set cell axes of current model. This command will modify an existing cell or add a new cell to a model currently without a unit cell specification.
For example:
sets the model's cell to be cubic with side length 15 Angstrom.

listitem.para: millercut ( int h, int k, int l, bool inside = FALSE )

section.para: Remove all atoms from the unit cell that lay 'outside' the specified Miller plane (and its mirror, if it has one). If the final parameter is given as TRUE, then atoms 'inside' the bounding Miller plane(s) are selected.
For example:
removes all atoms inside the two enclosing (121) planes.

section.title: scale

listitem.para: scale ( double x, double y, double z, bool calcenergy = FALSE )

section.para: Scale unit cell and its constituent atoms by the scale factors ''x'', ''y'', and ''z''. The optional ''calcenergy'' parameter calculates the energy difference resulting from the scaling operation.
For example:
doubles the length of the y-axis of the system. x- and z-axes remain unchanged.

section.title: scalemolecules

listitem.para: scalemolecules ( double, x, double y, double z, bool calcenergy = FALSE )

section.para: Scale unit cell and centres-of-geometry of molecules within it by the scale factors ''x'', ''y'', and ''z''. Within individual molecules the relative distances between atoms stays the same, but the centres-of-geometry of other molecules do not. The optional ''calcenergy'' parameter calculates the energy difference resulting from the scaling operation.
For example:
halves the lengths of all axes, scaling the positions of the molecules to reflect the new size.

section.title: spacegroup
section.para: Sets the spacegroup of the model, used for crystal packing.
